Šou bude divákov aj tento rok sprevádzať obľúbený herec Marek Fašiang a chýbať nebude ani ostrieľaný hospodár Martin Bagar.

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Adela show
programme.sub-title: Talkshow Adely Banášovej
programme.desc: Talkshow Adely Banášovej

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Najhoršie je, keď matka prežije svoje dieťa. Ešte horšie snáď je, keď vlastné dieťa matku oberie o byt a úspory. Eva, matka 5 dospelých detí, skončila ako bezdomovec v záhradnej chatke. Za niektorých platí z malej penzie stále pôžičky. Svokra robí čo môže, vybavuje na úradoch, stretáva sa s dcérou. Podarí sa otvoriť srdcia matke a dcére, aby opäť našli cestu k sebe? Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach. Pomoc, ide svokra!! Príde, obráti naruby domácnosť, vychová Vaše deti, vychová Vášho psa... Jazdí po Slovensku a má čo povedať do všetkých aspektov domácnosti! Navštevuje problémové rodiny, ktoré z rôznych dôvodov volajú o pomoc skúsenej ženy (neporiadok, finančné starosti, lenivý manžel, neporiadne deti...). Počas niekoľkých dní bude najprv sledovať a neskôr dohovárať a vysvetľovať obom manželom ako na vec. Svokra je dôkazom toho, že aj reality show môžu mať pozitívne, dlhodobé, život meniace následky. Reality šou poskytuje pohľad na transformáciu domácnosti, dáva divákovi možnosť nahliadnuť, ako žijú slovenské rodiny a ako zvládajú svoje deti, domácnosť, rozpočet, atď. Každá epizóda je plná bystrých a užitočných tipov ako viesť domácnosť, ktoré si divák môže vyskúšať.

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Privát: Nina a Betka sú študentky posledného ročníka vysokej školy. Po rokoch strávených na internáte sa rozhodli prenajať si spolu byt. Krátko po nasťahovaní však zistia, že v ich bytovke sa dejú zvláštne veci...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Karma: Manželia Kamil a Mária so synom Jankom žijú bežným životom na dedine, neďaleko mesta, kam Kamil dochádza za prácou. Ich pokojný stereotyp naruší nevšedná udalosť, ktorá navyše otrasie ich manželstvom...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Amnézia: Sochárka Denisa a podnikateľ Oliver sú spokojnými manželmi pätnásť rokov. Oliver sa snaží dať Denise čo najpohodlnejší život, no jej chýba niečo iné. Všetko sa zmení po tom, čo sa Oliver ocitne v nemocnici a Denisa musí zmeniť svoj pohľad na svet...

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Svokra. Komediálny seriál SR (2006).
programme.desc: Sú Dušičky. Na návštevu nečakane zavíta Františkova mama, ktorú Zuzana nemá veľmi v láske. Celé upratovanie bytu preto nechá na Františka. Ildikó zas na pamiatku zosnulých oplakáva svojho psa Bundášika.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Miss lesa. Komediálny seriál SR (2006).
programme.desc: Zuzana má opäť plné ruky práce – práve totiž dorazila ďalšia zásielka jej „teleshoppingových hovädín“! Tentoraz nakúpila množstvo „bejbyfónov“, ku ktorým výhodne dostala i sadu podbradníčkov a cumlíčkov... František, veľký fanúšik Star Treku, ju nevedomky vytáča svojim voľnými kreáciami jednotlivých sekvencií, v ktorých figuruje ako „komandér Riker z vesmírnej lode Enterprise“, komunikujúci pomocou vysielačky (rozumej bejbyfónu) so svojím kapitánom... Ešte šťastie, že František zakrátko stratí záujem, pretože má plnú hlavu myšlienok na voľbu Miss lesa, ktorá sa má konať v jeho horárni. Ešte predtým si však musí poradiť s ako vždy katastrofálnym kuchárskym umením susedky Ildikó, pretože na Miss lesa prišiel, ako inak, zlákať aj Lászlóa - neprozreteľne však práve vtedy, keď varila - tentoraz „volove oko“! Mimochodom na Miss lesa sa má objaviť aj minuloročná víťazka a Františkova aktuálna sekretárka Tánička (o čom však Zuzana ani Ildikó samozrejme netušia), obdarená vskutku mimoriadnymi prednosťami... László pomaly šalie – nie však kvôli Miss lesa, ale preto, lebo z viacerých náznakov vydedukoval, že jeho milovaná Ildikó je tehotná!

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: (Bez)nádej: Daniela a Tomáš sú manželmi tri roky, no zatiaľ nepomýšľajú na založenie rodiny. Obaja totiž preferujú bezstarostný život. Naopak Tomášov brat Jakub má opačné priority, s manželkou sa už roky neúspešne snažia o potomka. Obe rodiny však v krátkom čase musia prehodnotiť svoje postoje...

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú II
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Michal si nechá od Romana poradiť, aj keď netuší, či Roman myslí svoj záujem o dobro fabriky úprimne. Šátek nájde na Oľgu niečo, čím ju môže Nora úplne zdiskreditovať. Gejza varuje Zorbu, že životy Pauly a Paľka sú ohrozené.

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Na nože II
programme.sub-title: Reality show SR (2023)
programme.desc: Motorest na Hôrke: Tehotná Zdenka prevádzkuje motorest, do ktorého nikto nechodí. Čo sa stane, keď bude musieť ísť na materskú? Dokáže šéfkuchár Martin Novák pomôcť reštaurácii, ktorá vyzerá ako kovošrot? Jarný divácky hit Na nože pokračuje na jeseň 2023 ďalšími premiérovými časťami. V čisto slovenskej verzii formátu Kitchen Nightmares si srdcia divákov okamžite získal renomovaný a viacerými prestížnymi oceneniami ovenčený šéfkuchár Martin Novák, ktorý podával pomocnú ruku problémovým a krachujúcim reštauráciám. Nekládol si pri tom servítku pred ústa a často bol aj poriadne prísnym kritikom. Nie vždy sa však jeho snaha pomôcť stretla s pochopením a častokrát to boli práve majitelia reštaurácií, ktorí v podniku držali zatiahnutú ručnú brzdu. V druhej sérii Martin znova navštívi vybrané gastronomické prevádzky po celom Slovensku a za prítomnosti televíznych kamier sa pokúsi vytiahnuť z problémov tie, ktoré sa z najrôznejších dôvodov ocitli v kríze, alebo dokonca na hranici krachu. Po nejakom čase každú reštauráciu prekvapí svojou návštevou, aby preveril, či naozaj došlo k zlepšeniu a reštaurácii odovzdá nálepku s hodnotením. Na nože je formát plný emócií, pri ktorého sledovaní sa diváci TV Markíza ani túto jeseň rozhodne nebudú nudiť!

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Najkrajšia bytovka: Ildikó sa opäť ráno vracia rozžiarená v župane domov s veľkým balíkom. László začína vážne žiarliť. Neupokojí ho ani to, že Ildikó len dala opäť urobiť veľké svadobné fotografie Milky a Gergeja. Andrejka zapája všetkých do súťaže o najkrajšiu bytovku. Núti ich upratať a vyzdobiť kvetmi balkón, umyť okná, z trávnika okolo domu vyzbierať smeti a psie výkaly a dokonca si aj poumývať autá na parkovisku. Ildikó opäť prichytí Gergeja s Andrejkou takmer inflagranti! Susedia sa rozhodnú, že Andrejke musia nájsť partnera, aby správnym smerom usmernili jej energiu a zachránili Milkine manželstvo. Ako zareaguje Milka na údajnú Gergejovu neveru? Podarí sa všetkým spoločne získať diplom pre najkrajšiu bytovku? Prečo dala Ildi tentoraz svadobné fotografie zarámovať aj so sklom? Kto odvezie Lászlóa a Františka do nemocnice a bude ich obetavosť odmenená úspešným vyriešením tejto situácie?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Výročník: Minulý týždeň dal László Františkovi darček. Podpivník z podniku kde sa pred 30-timi rokmi začalo ich priateľstvo. František mu na oplátku daroval pohár z piva, ktoré tam píjavali. Lenže na fotografii s čašníčkou Lucianou s bujným poprsím, z ktorej každý opatruje jednu polovicu, vidno že v krčme sa čapovala úplne iná značka! Pre Lászlóa je to koniec ich priateľstva. Ildikó aj Zuzane vadí, že Andrejkin nový frajer, doktor Vojtíšek, v snahe zapadnúť, je veľmi "vlezlý". Je ale veľmi slušný a takého človeka je ťažko vyhodiť. Zuzana chce z ich štvorice doplnenej o Martu vytvoriť silnú komunitu, aby pochopil, že tam nepatrí a dal pokoj. Lenže najprv musia udobriť Lászlóa s Františkom. Uskutočnia happening, kde zrekonštruujú ich prvé stretnutie. Čo odhalia pri hľadaní dobových rekvizít vo Františkovej "škatuli na spomienky"? Čo spája Lászlóa a Františka s atraktívnou čašníčkou okrem spomienok? Podarí sa im ju po toľkých rokoch nájsť? Ako dopadne celé udobrovanie?

programme.title: Farma
programme.desc: Televízia Markíza prináša na obrazovky neuveriteľnú pätnástu sériu obľúbenej reality šou Farma. programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Iva žila ako bežný človek. Mala prácu, bývala v peknom podnájme a mala partnera s ktorým nemohla roky otehotnieť. Postupom času zhoda náhod prevrátila Ive život naruby. Bez rodičov, po odchode partnera a deň pred smrťou sestry zistila, že je v druhom stave. Bez peňazí, bez práce, bez bývania. S jedným kufrom „na ulici“ mesiac pred pôrodom - do tejto situácie zavolala Iva Gizku dúfajúc, že jej pomôže. Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach. Pomoc, ide svokra!! Príde, obráti naruby domácnosť, vychová Vaše deti, vychová Vášho psa... Jazdí po Slovensku a má čo povedať do všetkých aspektov domácnosti! Navštevuje problémové rodiny, ktoré z rôznych dôvodov volajú o pomoc skúsenej ženy (neporiadok, finančné starosti, lenivý manžel, neporiadne deti...). Počas niekoľkých dní bude najprv sledovať a neskôr dohovárať a vysvetľovať obom manželom ako na vec. Svokra je dôkazom toho, že aj reality show môžu mať pozitívne, dlhodobé, život meniace následky. Reality šou poskytuje pohľad na transformáciu domácnosti, dáva divákovi možnosť nahliadnuť, ako žijú slovenské rodiny a ako zvládajú svoje deti, domácnosť, rozpočet, atď. Každá epizóda je plná bystrých a užitočných tipov ako viesť domácnosť, ktoré si divák môže vyskúšať.

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Dom: Koprnoví a Svitkoví sa poznajú vyše 20 rokov. Obe rodiny spolu vychádzajú. Nesusedia hneď vedľa seba, medzi nimi žije v opustenom dome čudáčka - pani Hulmanová. Ich vzťahy sa začnú meniť po tom, čo u starej pani sa stane tragédia.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: (Bez)nádej: Daniela a Tomáš sú manželmi tri roky, no zatiaľ nepomýšľajú na založenie rodiny. Obaja totiž preferujú bezstarostný život. Naopak Tomášov brat Jakub má opačné priority, s manželkou sa už roky neúspešne snažia o potomka. Obe rodiny však v krátkom čase musia prehodnotiť svoje postoje...

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Narodeniny. Komediálny seriál SR (2006).
programme.desc: František má narodeniny, no trápi ho kontrola v horárni. Ostatní mu chcú pripraviť narodeninové prekvapenie – bežiaci pás na cvičenie. László mu za seba pripravil vlastné prekvapenie – striptérku, ktorá má vyskočiť zo škatule. Zuzane aj Ildikó sa taký darček nepáči a situáciu vyriešia po svojom. Lászla však počas príprav kopne elektrický prúd z bežiaceho pásu a jediné, čo si dokáže vybaviť sú mená československých futbalistov zo 70tych rokov. Ako dopadne oslava?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Výročie svadby. Komediálny seriál SR (2006).
programme.desc: František bojuje proti svojej pažravosti – v noci ho to neodolateľne láka vyjedať chladničku. László mu vymyslí zabezpečovací systém s číselným kódom. Zuzana donúti Františka ísť do opery, ktorú on bytostne neznáša. Ildikó a Lázsló majú 19. výročie svadby. Poštár zamení darček pre Ildikó a omylom ho doručí Zuzane. Aby jej nebolo ľúto musí František vymyslieť náhradné prekvapenie.

programme.desc: Nezištná láska: Ivana prežíva ťažké obdobie, pretože prišla o manžela Petra, s ktorým vychovávala jedenásťročnú Lenku. Po smrti však zisťuje, že jej zanechal dlhy, ktoré musí splatiť ich niekdajšiemu priateľovi. Aby uživila seba i dcéru, je nútená urobiť nezvyčajné rozhodnutie...

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú II
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Oľga ponúkne Zorbovi udanie Nory v prípade, že jej a Romanovi za to ponúkne beztrestnosť. Michal je ochotný Borisa vypočuť, on mu však môže ponúknuť len úprimnosť. Argumenty, ktorými by svoje činy ospravedlnil nemá. Splní Gejza úlohu od Jevgeniho a zabije Viktora?

programme.title: Farma
programme.desc: Televízia Markíza prináša na obrazovky neuveriteľnú pätnástu sériu obľúbenej reality šou Farma. Tentokrát to na statku bude o „súboji generácií“, kedy o atraktívnu finančnú výhru zabojuje 15 farmárov, rozdelených do troch skupín podľa generácie. Každá sa narodila v inom období a práve Farma ukáže, ktorá generácia na statku uspeje – bude to skupina X, narodená pred rokom 1989, skupina Y – deti 90-tych rokov alebo najmladšia generácia Z, narodená po roku 2000? Fanúšikovia obľúbenej šou sa znovu môžu tešiť na staronové prostredie Považského Inovca, v ktorom sa natáčala 13. séria Farmy, nekompromisnú Alicu, nový typ farmárčenia spojený s množstvo noviniek a výrazne zmenené pravidlá, ktoré prekvapia nejedného farmára. Opäť nebudú chýbať ani napínavé duely či jednotlivé epizódy, v ktorých sa bude striedať smiech, slzy, vtipné i dramatické situácie, a tak ako vždy budú plné nečakaných zvratov. Šou bude divákov aj tento rok sprevádzať obľúbený herec Marek Fašiang a chýbať nebude ani ostrieľaný hospodár Martin Bagar.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: (Bez)nádej: Daniela a Tomáš sú manželmi tri roky, no zatiaľ nepomýšľajú na založenie rodiny. Obaja totiž preferujú bezstarostný život. programme.title: Chlapi neplačú II
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Michal si nechá od Romana poradiť, aj keď netuší, či Roman myslí svoj záujem o dobro fabriky úprimne. Šátek nájde na Oľgu niečo, čím ju môže Nora úplne zdiskreditovať. Gejza varuje Zorbu, že životy Pauly a Paľka sú ohrozené.

programme.title: Na nože II
programme.sub-title: Reality show SR (2023)
programme.desc: Motorest na Hôrke: Tehotná Zdenka prevádzkuje motorest, do ktorého nikto nechodí. Čo sa stane, keď bude musieť ísť na materskú? Dokáže šéfkuchár Martin Novák pomôcť reštaurácii, ktorá vyzerá ako kovošrot? Jarný divácky hit Na nože pokračuje na jeseň 2023 ďalšími premiérovými časťami. V čisto slovenskej verzii formátu Kitchen Nightmares si srdcia divákov okamžite získal renomovaný a viacerými prestížnymi oceneniami ovenčený šéfkuchár Martin Novák, ktorý podával pomocnú ruku problémovým a krachujúcim reštauráciám. Nekládol si pri tom servítku pred ústa a často bol aj poriadne prísnym kritikom. Nie vždy sa však jeho snaha pomôcť stretla s pochopením a častokrát to boli práve majitelia reštaurácií, ktorí v podniku držali zatiahnutú ručnú brzdu. V druhej sérii Martin znova navštívi vybrané gastronomické prevádzky po celom Slovensku a za prítomnosti televíznych kamier sa pokúsi vytiahnuť z problémov tie, ktoré sa z najrôznejších dôvodov ocitli v kríze, alebo dokonca na hranici krachu. Po nejakom čase každú reštauráciu prekvapí svojou návštevou, aby preveril, či naozaj došlo k zlepšeniu a reštaurácii odovzdá nálepku s hodnotením. Na nože je formát plný emócií, pri ktorého sledovaní sa diváci TV Markíza ani túto jeseň rozhodne nebudú nudiť!

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Adela show
programme.sub-title: Talkshow Adely Banášovej
programme.desc: Talkshow Adely Banášovej

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: V tejto epizóde televízna svokra Gizka vypočula volanie nešťastnej Kristíny zo Senca. Táto 30-ročná matka troch detí žije v sociálne slabších podmienkach s rómskym partnerom s drogovou závislosťou. Neustále mení podnájmy a vracia sa k svojim rodičom do panelákového bytu. Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach. Pomoc, ide svokra!! Príde, obráti naruby domácnosť, vychová Vaše deti, vychová Vášho psa... Jazdí po Slovensku a má čo povedať do všetkých aspektov domácnosti! Navštevuje problémové rodiny, ktoré z rôznych dôvodov volajú o pomoc skúsenej ženy (neporiadok, finančné starosti, lenivý manžel, neporiadne deti...). Počas niekoľkých dní bude najprv sledovať a neskôr dohovárať a vysvetľovať obom manželom ako na vec. Svokra je dôkazom toho, že aj reality show môžu mať pozitívne, dlhodobé, život meniace následky. Reality šou poskytuje pohľad na transformáciu domácnosti, dáva divákovi možnosť nahliadnuť, ako žijú slovenské rodiny a ako zvládajú svoje deti, domácnosť, rozpočet, atď. Každá epizóda je plná bystrých a užitočných tipov ako viesť domácnosť, ktoré si divák môže vyskúšať.

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Druhá puberta: Alojz a Vojto sú dlhoroční susedia. Obaja sú vdovci, obaja na dôchodku, voľný čas trávia hraním kariet. Ich pokojný životný štýl naruší príchod mladej atraktívnej slečny. Tá sa má stať ich novou susedkou...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Nezištná láska: Ivana prežíva ťažké obdobie, pretože prišla o manžela Petra, s ktorým vychovávala jedenásťročnú Lenku. Po smrti však zisťuje, že jej zanechal dlhy, ktoré musí splatiť ich niekdajšiemu priateľovi. Aby uživila seba i dcéru, je nútená urobiť nezvyčajné rozhodnutie...

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Horáreň. Komediálny seriál SR (2006).
programme.desc: Ildikó je nešťastná, lebo László z prepracovania stratil sexuálny apetít. Poradí sa so Zuzanou, ako ho opäť navnadiť. Zuzana navrhne, že prostredie Františkovej horárne má tú správnu atmosféru a prinesie príjemnú zmenu. Nevie, že František horáreň príležitostne prenajíma párom na ich radovánky. Zhodou okolností si ju na ten večer rezervovala Marta so svojím novým nápadníkom.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Víkend. Komediálny seriál SR (2006).
programme.desc: Zuzana dostane za zásluhy v predávaní teleshoppingových projektov víkendový pobyt v Tatrách. S Františkom sa už tešia na to, ako si oddýchnu. Ich susedia László a Ildikó nesprávne pochopia prosbu, aby im zatiaľ poliali kvety a myslia si, že na predĺžený víkend idú všetci štyria. Ildikó sa balí do veľkých kufrov a berie všetko, vrátane dvojplatničky. František a Zuzana musia susedom citlivo vysvetliť, že sa ich tento netýka.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.sub-title: Finger Family. Sing along with the whole family in this familiar, fun song!
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Saving Mooncake. When Ella borrows Slippy’s luckiest good luck charm, she risks losing it forever when she finds herself at a black hole. It’s only when everyone pools their strengths together that Mooncake is returned to Slippy, safe and sound.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: A Star is born. It’s Ella’s mom’s birthday! Determined to get her mom the bestest birthday gift ever, Ella searches the Galaxy with help from her friends. But with time running out, she’ll have to realize that the best gift of all may not come wrapped in a box...

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Chocks Away. When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by that of a rival kid, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge. Next day, his newly constructed fighter plane, almost ready for take-off, sadly lacks a vital part – and the blinking model shop is shut! No matter. It’s chocks away with Teddy at the controls, fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Royal Bean. When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers there's only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majesty's corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Young Bean. When did Mr. Bean first meet his teddy bear? Did he really learn to drive his mini at the age of ten? Could he possibly have known his battle-axe of a landlady when she was a sweet and blushing bride? Bean takes us on a journey into the past, answering these questions and giving us an inkling as to what made him the man he is today.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: In the pink. Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean can’t bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.desc: For the Win. Ella’s mom is a hall of fame Enceladus 500 race champion, and Ella wants to be just like her! She plans to skate, scooter race and geyser jump her way to a championship trophy!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Highs and Lows. Ella and Slippy have been practicing their rock-climbing skills, so that they can tackle the recently formed, huge crater on Saturn’s moon, Enceladus. Ella, however, prefers relying on her space boots to get her to the top of the rock wall

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Missing in Traction. When Tom's hit by a trolley while he and Jerry are investigating their latest case, he's sent to recover at the local animal hospital. But a detective is never off the case! Tom begins to suspect the answer to the case they're working on is right under his broken nose. Problem is, he's in traction and can't move. That's okay, he's got a partner in crime-solving – Doc Jerry makes the rounds at the animal hospital and solves the mystery, but not before sending Tom on the rounds to endure various tests (e.g. x-rays, stress test, physical therapy, etc…) and to do some investigating of his own.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Cat-titude Adjustment. After another destructive bout of cat and mouse, Hildie and Beatie decide that Tom's bad cat-titude has caused nothing but trouble around the cottage. What Tom needs is an attitude adjustment! With a flick of the wand, Tom becomes a doting cat. Much better! Jerry's loving the change at first, but he soon tires of the touchy-feely feline (even Newt is tiring of Tom's affections). Jerry tries every mouse trick in the book to trigger Tom's animal instincts, but nothing seems to break the spell. Jerry has to sneak Hildie's wand to reverse the spell, but it won't be easy with tag-along-Tom by his side every step of the way!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Funnel Face. When a little cat and mouse ends poorly for Tom, he ends up having to wear the cone of shame. Unable to remove it, deal with the emotional shame, or adapt to the giant plastic funnel on his head, Tom must find meaning in the suffering.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Wing Nuts. Little Quacker is heartsick and he's come to the cat and mouse detective to help mend his broken heart. You see, the duck fell in love at first quack with a bird he met luxuriating in the central park pond. The courtship went south (literally) when Quacker's honey coo-coo migrated with her flock. All that Quacker has left of her is a single feather and he's counting on the cat and mouse detective to find his one true love. Prince Charming had an easier time finding Cinderella with a glass slipper, but Tom and Jerry aren't about to fly the coop. In the end, they find the owner of the lost feather and reunite the two lovebirds who fly off into the sunset...

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow. Tom's being unusually difficult when he's rocked by an epiphany-- HE'S LOSING HIS HAIR! Paranoid that he's going to become a hairless cat, Tom will do anything Jerry tells him to do in order to regrow it. Think mud packs (more like mud slaps), hair transfers (one word – furballs) deep tissue massage to stimulate follicle development (a.k.a repeated blows to the head), and skunk therapy ('nuf said). Most everything he tries only leads to Ginger throwing him in the bath again. Ultimately, Tom realizes that Jerry's spiking his cat shampoo with hair remover and it's about to get hairy for the mouse!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.sub-title: Hunger Games. Tom is told he can't eat for 12 hours!
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: The Crystal Contingency. Ella and Tilly’s playtime results in the smashing of precious crystals that are part of Mom’s meticulous experiments. Determined to replace them, Ella battles a pulsar and then a super-hot planet before she realizes her sidelined little sister could be a big help!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Jupiter's Moons. Slippy’s excited to try out his new Rocket Boosters. He’s so excited that he overloads them and becomes stranded on a dangerous moon with Madhu. It’s up to Ella to jog Madhu’s memory so they can find the right moon and save Slippy!

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.sub-title: Finger Family. Sing along with the whole family in this familiar, fun song!
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Haircut. After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all round…but then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by… his hair.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Neighbourly Bean. As Mr Bean settles down to watch his favourite TV programme he hears loud noises from next-door. He moves from house to garden but can’t escape the relentless cacophony of trumpets, electric drills, and screaming babies. Bean’s mind turns to thoughts of revenge….

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Nurse! Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to 'break' his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesn't enjoy.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Dead Cat. Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landlady’s vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that it’s rubbish collection day.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz II
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz III
programme.desc: DOROTHY AND THE WIZARD OF OZ is an animated comedy fantasy series that transports viewers back to the wonderful land of Oz. Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale (GREY DeLISLE) has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Electric Turtles. The turtles are struck by lightning during a storm, turning them into positively charged projectiles zapping everything they touch and setting off all the appliances in the house. Mike gets locked outside by the raccoons who were freezing their little butts off in their lair. By the time Mike gets back inside all hell has broken loose, but Mike might have figured out how he can get rid of the raccoons and de-electrify the turtles at the same time.

programme.sub-title: Ants Go Marching
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: The Wild Wood Warblers. Badger finds an old dirty painting of the Riverbankers’ ancestors as a choir and Ratty offers to put a new choir together. Chief and Tinker won’t let him Smudge join. Only a full restoration of the painting will reveal who really was in the The Wild Wood Warblers!

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Waiting. The bugs talk about waiting for things they really want.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Disappointment. The bugs talk about times they felt disappointed.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Glitch's Big Day. When Glitch’s arm shorts out, Ella’s dad has the right tools to fix him. While he’s at it, Dad shows off his latest creation, a Super Towing Arm. Slippy is impressed and Glitch is more than happy to try it on for size

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Interstellar Pet Sitter. Ella is enlisted to pet sit Buttons, a friend’s dog, on the very day she has to finish a school project about Venus. She decides to take on both responsibilities at once by taking Buttons with her to the planet to capture the final piece of video footage she needs. When the thunder from the storms around Venus scare Buttons into accidentally detaching himself from his pod, he lands on the pla net and disappears. Ella and her friends search frantically on the hot planet but cannot find him. It’s Buttons who finds Ella! Ella admits she shouldn’t have taken her furry friend with her, but at least she learned new facts for her project!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Sofa. Mr. Bean likes nothing more than to relax on his sofa with a good meal and his favourite telly programme. Unfortunately, a painful explosion of springs under his bottom puts an end to that. He sets about buying another one… but, alas, sofas are expensive items. TV dinners may well be a thing of the past for Mr Bean.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Treasure! In a dark and cobwebby corner of his attic, Mr. Bean finds a treasure map. The hunt is on! But tricky clues lead Bean up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Homeless. After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Camping. An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem – but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: That's so Madhu. Madhu has special presents for Ella and Slippy, to celebrate the anniversary of the day they met. But when Ella and Slippy say they can’t hang out, Madhu is sent off with only Maggie for company

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Ghost Story. Slippy has heard a rumour that the abandoned outpost the gang plans to visit is haunted so he brings his ghost detector goggles, just in case! Ella assures him that there are no such things as ghosts, but then odd things begin to happen.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Forget Me Not. Jerry brings Tom to consciousness. His partner has an aluminum bat on his head, arrow in his butt, bee stings on his arm, tire treads on his back, lipstick on his cheek and a terrible case of amnesia. Jerry must help Tom use the investigative clues on his body to solve what happened. The clues will take them to some destinations that may leave Tom more physically abused than when he started but in better mental shape (as each stop causes a little more memory to return).

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.sub-title: Move It or Lose It. Spike gives Tom an impossible task.
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Cat Dance Fever. The Cat's Meow Dance Competition is coming up and Toodles' dance partner has gone missing! In the meantime, Toodles needs a new dance partner in case hers doesn't turn up. Butch and Tom go toe-to-toe for the honor. But when Tom manages to nab the spot, he winds up disappearing, too! Now it's up to Jerry to solve the case!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Dirty Rat. A little cat and mouse leads Jerry to take refuge in his hole in the wall where he runs into Franky Two-Face the rat, who now calls Jerry's home, HIS home. Tom finds this funny, of course. Franky Two-Face leads Tom to believe the two are working together but Franky's a no-good, dirty rat. He doesn't play fair. He's a liar, a sneak, a dirty player, just an all-around dirty rat. He goes to the cats in the alley, says Jerry thinks they're soft, steals things from Spike and sets Tom up as the thief. Franky Two-Face knows every dirty trick in the book, except one; the one Tom and Jerry use to get rid of Franky Two-Face.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry-Geddon. Tuffy and Jerry are brushing their teeth. Tuffy's so tired he uses Jerry's tail instead of his toothbrush. They climb in their respective beds, only Tuffy's not in his bed, he's in the palm of Tom's hand that Tom's made-up to look like a bed. Tom gets walloped for his little stunt but it points out to Jerry that he needs a safer home. What begins with Jerry securing his home from Tom, turns into an arms race between the cat and mouse where they each build their own booby-trapped bunker to protect themselves from each other. They turn out to be their own greatest enemy, with the biggest threat coming from their own creations. In the end, they go back to their relatively safer existence.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Tic-Tyke-D'oh. Spike hasn't been the best role model for his boy when it comes to being a good sport. You could even say Spike's a sore loser. That's why Spike recruits Tom and Jerry to help teach the little guy how to lose gracefully. When Tom beats Tyke at a game of tic-tac-toe Tyke puts the "sore" into "sore loser" by biting Tom's finger when Tom extends it for a friendly post-game handshake. Tom forces Jerry to take turns playing various games with Tyke (e.g. Checkers, basketball, hopscotch, etc…). Each time they win, Tyke takes it out on them. When Tom and Jerry start throwing the games, Spike's right there to dole out his own punishment for letting Tyke win. Sometimes you just can't win!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Interstellar Treasure Hunter. Dad gives Ella and Slippy a mysterious Treasure Map of their solar system. When Ella cuts corners as soon as she realizes where the final step is! But when that doesn’t yield them the treasure, she must learn to follow instructions. All of them...

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Speed of Ella. Ella’s super excited to check out the Orion flare stars with her family. She’s been looking forward to it for weeks. But when Madhu asks a favour and Slippy calls her for help, Ella can’t say no and might miss the festival entirely! Can she use science to get there in time?

programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: In the pink. Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean can’t bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Dinner for two. Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when you've got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Ball. The nasty tennis player is big and angry and wants his ball back. The one Mr. Bean managed to throw on the roof of a house across the road. Paralysed with vertigo sixty feet up on a windowsill, he is eventually brought to earth by the helpful intervention of a neighbour’s pet gerbil.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Toothache. Bean’s sweet tooth leads him to despair when he bites off a bit more than he can chew. He is tormented by the toothache from Hell - and embarks on a hilarious mission to pull out this menace. Bean’s DIY attempts fail to succeed, and he is left with no other choice but to visit the dreaded dentist. But can Bean brave the Dentist’s chair? Or will the dentist despair when faced with Bean’s antics?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Lighthouse Disco
programme.desc: Lighthouse Disco

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Rescuing Roxanne. Playing with Louise and her doll gives Mike an idea. He decides to stage a rescue mission with the doll from the roof of the Mikkelson's house so he can be a hero and impress Iris. But as he prepares to show Iris that he's a real-life superhero, the racoons arrive and ruin his plans. Mercury falls in love with the doll the minute he lays eyes on it while Freddy sets his sights on her sparkly tiara. Now Mike has a real rescue on his hands, all under Iris's watchful gaze. The stakes couldn't be higher!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: A Sick Trick. The racoons watch Mike enviously as he makes himself comfortable in his living room. If only they could get a piece of that sweet action. Then Freddy has an idea. He crashes into the bay window and pretends to be injured, forcing the Mikkelsens to take him in. Mike sees through the ruse immediately, but if he's going to unmask the scheming raccoon he's going to have to defeat the imposter without getting himself in trouble for fighting the poor "injured" Freddy.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Hypnosis. Mike wakes up in the bathtub, huh? The house has been turned upside down and the other animals are being weird. They're acting like zombies and carrying food out of the house. Our pug discovers that the raccoons have hypnotised Fluffy, the turtles, and Iris, and are using them to transport the contents of the Mikkelsens fridge to their lair. Our hero will need to confront Iris to save her from the raccoon's dastardly scheme... and refill the Mikkelson's fridge!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: Hot Air Toad. Toad boasts he can get to the seaside in his hot air ballon and be back in time for his grand dinner. He soon gets into trouble and crash lands in the Wild Woods. Trapped in the ropes and branches of trees, Toad is helpless to stop the weasels marching on Toad Hall.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Favourite Things. The bugs talk about some of their favourite things.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Birthdays. The bugs talk about birthdays.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Big Little Problems. How can one little golf ball cause a crater the size of a house? By hurtling through space - that’s how! One little rock can cause a chain reaction by hitting bigger and bigger pieces.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: The Big Break. After hurting her leg, Ella has to take it easy for an entire day. Does she have the patience to sit and rest for that long? When she runs out of activities at home, Ella’s dad offers to take her along on one of his towing operations

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Ray of Sunshine. It’s a beautiful day at the beach. Bean breathes in the salty air, bliss - and not another soul in sight. What could possibly spoil his perfect day? Answer: British weather. Mr. Bean finds himself chasing an illusive ray of sunshine across town, over hills and dales, a football stadium and the English Channel.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Birthday Bear. Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Bean’s girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bear’s Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything? A morning in a toy shop, burgers for lunch and a slap up tea party, of course. (But only if you can afford it.)

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Mole. Mr. Bean’s landlady is hopping mad on finding molehills on her lovely croquet lawn. Bean looks to get hammered if he does not rid the old lady of the cuddly little half-blind culprit. He fails dismally with his eccentric mole extermination methods and ends up simply taking the pesky rodent for a ride.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Roadworks. Mr. Bean’s tranquillity is shattered by deafening roadworks outside his bedroom window. Threats, sabotage and subterfuge all fail to quell the cacophony until Bean has the ingenious idea of feeding the workmen into peaceful submission. But the silence ends with a bang!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: The Wild Wood Warblers. Badger finds an old dirty painting of the Riverbankers’ ancestors as a choir and Ratty offers to put a new choir together. Chief and Tinker won’t let him Smudge join. Only a full restoration of the painting will reveal who really was in the The Wild Wood Warblers!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Skiff Upon the Sea
programme.desc: Skiff Upon the Sea

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Momella Day. Ella always looks forward to Momella Day. And this Momella day promises to be the most interstellar yet, because they are going to see a small but powerful Red Dwarf star!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: The Martian Chronicles. Priya has arrived from Earth to complete a school project about Mars. Priya is unfamiliar with the planet and a bit nervous about its huge dust storms. Ella, Slippy and Madhu convince her she needs to visit Mars.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Unhappily Harried After. It's Tom's wedding day! He's getting married to Toodles in a backyard wedding that we're experiencing through the eyes of his best friend, Jerry. Puuuuurfeeecttt in every way, then the crap hits the mouse hole: Tom is given Jerry as a wedding gift. When it can't possibly get worse Jerry wakes up and tosses Toodles out of the house!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: In The Beginning. We open on a SOLD sign in front of what will be Rick and Ginger's house. Inside, the house is empty – no Rick, no Ginger, no Tom, no furniture. Just Jerry, who slip slides merrily across the bare floors – the place all to himself. That is until the front door opens and Rick and Ginger arrive in their new home. Ginger screams having just seen a mouse and tells Rick to get Tom out of the moving van. Like most cats in a new place, Tom doesn't want to come out from beneath the recently placed couch, but Ginger demands he catch that mouse! And so we watch the beginning of a lifelong adversarial relationship unfold one gag at a time!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.sub-title: Splinter of Discontent. Tom & Jerry help Tyke with a splinter.
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Uncle Pecos Rides Again. Tom and Jerry are in the middle of it when Tom hears someone singing the tale of a cat who met his unfortunate, painful end chasing a much superior opponent. The song is about underestimating your opponent. Every time Tom stops chasing Jerry, the music stops. When Tom resumes, the music resumes. This back and forth continues until the chase takes Tom right past a Singing Uncle Pecos. Tom skids to a stop causing Uncle Pecos to stop singing. Tom wants to prove the lyrics of Uncle Pecos song wrong, but in the end, Tom's ego proves to everyone, including himself, that he is very much the subject of Uncle Pecos cautionary tale.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.sub-title: Out with the Old. Jerry thinks that Tom is going to be replaced.
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: While using a wand to make inanimate objects come to life to attack Jerry, Tom accidentally zaps a marionette (Marie Antoin-marionette). Now the cat and mouse have more on their hands than either one of them can handle! Sure the marionette pulls Hildie and Beatie's heart-strings when they are around (both are thrilled to have another girl in the house even if she is made of wood), but the doll delights in getting Tom into trouble when the witch sisters aren't looking. When Marie becomes too much for even Jerry to bear, Tom and Jerry have to figure out how to get rid of the little hellion! They brought her into this world, now they've got to take her out!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Space Oddity. When a prized possession goes missing, Slippy’s sure the mysterious Alien Silicon Jellyfish took it! Ella’s pretty sure the Jellyfish doesn’t exist... but as the gang hunts for it, Ella learns that supporting her friend is what matters most!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Runaway Rover. On the eve of Dad opening his museum of human artifacts on the moon, Ella and Slippy help him by “fixing” a lunar rover until it drives off, with Glitch on board! Determined to fix this themselves, our gang understands it’s best to admit your mistake and ask for help.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Camping. An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem – but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Chocks Away. When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by that of a rival kid, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge. Next day, his newly constructed fighter plane, almost ready for take-off, sadly lacks a vital part – and the blinking model shop is shut! No matter. It’s chocks away with Teddy at the controls, fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Royal Bean. When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers there's only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majesty's corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Young Bean. When did Mr. Bean first meet his teddy bear? Did he really learn to drive his mini at the age of ten? Could he possibly have known his battle-axe of a landlady when she was a sweet and blushing bride? Bean takes us on a journey into the past, answering these questions and giving us an inkling as to what made him the man he is today.

programme.desc: Too Loud Nia

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.
